div.div: Castleford School District strives to create productive and responsible citizens, critical thinkers, effective problem solvers, and life-long learners.

img.style: background: orange; color: white; border: none;

li.div: "This is the most joyful day that ever I saw in my pilgrimage on earth."

h6.label: Stay Informed: Follow this site via email.

form.p: Enter your email address to follow this site and receive notifications of new posts by email.
